Instruction: Heat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius) and grease the cookie sheets.

Mix butter and brown sugar in a large bowl until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla extract, blend well. Combine flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt; add to the creamy mixture. Roll out dough to 1/4 inch thickness on a floured surface. Cut into shapes with cookie cutters and place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart on prepared cookie sheets.

Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely. Add frosting or sprinkles for decoration if desired.
